The framework returns an instance of this structure when your app calls [doc://com.apple.videosubscriberaccount/documentation/VideoSubscriberAccount/VSUserAccountManager/requestAutoSignInAuthorization()] to prompt a person for approval to opt in to Automatic Sign-In.

# VSUserAccountManager.AutoSignInTokenUpdateContext

**Structure**

An object that contains information about a person’s choice in the Automatic Sign-In prompt.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AutoSignInTokenUpdateContext
```

## Overview

The framework returns an instance of this structure when your app calls [doc://com.apple.videosubscriberaccount/documentation/VideoSubscriberAccount/VSUserAccountManager/requestAutoSignInAuthorization()] to prompt a person for approval to opt in to Automatic Sign-In.

Check the [doc://com.apple.videosubscriberaccount/documentation/VideoSubscriberAccount/VSAutoSignInTokenUpdateContext/authorization] property of this structure to determine the person’s answer to the prompt. If the value is [doc://com.apple.videosubscriberaccount/documentation/VideoSubscriberAccount/VSUserAccountManager/AutoSignInAuthorization/granted], generate a sign in token and pass the instance of this structure and the newly-generated token to the framework using the [doc://com.apple.videosubscriberaccount/documentation/VideoSubscriberAccount/VSUserAccountManager/updateAutoSignInToken(_:updateContext:)] method.

## Determining status

- **authorization**: A state that represents a person’s approval of Automatic Sign-In.

## Signing people in automatically

- **VSUserAccountManager.AutoSignInToken**: A value that represents a person’s account and their consent to Automatic Sign-In.
- **VSUserAccountManager.AutoSignInAuthorization**: The possible states the framework sets for Automatic Sign-In.
- **autoSignInToken**: The current Automatic Sign-In token.
- **deleteAutoSignInToken()**: Deletes the value of the current Automatic Sign-In token.
- **requestAutoSignInAuthorization()**: Presents a modal sheet that offers a person to opt in to Automatic Sign-In.
- **updateAutoSignInToken(_:updateContext:)**: Sets the current Automatic Sign-In token.
